pages.text: You're gonna be in debt after this one.$(br)If firing netherite off into the distance, never to return is alright, then netherite bullets are for you.$(br2)If you absolutely need to eliminate a target, this will get the job done. And if you're using a $(l:firearms/blunderbuss)blunderbuss$(), you'll instantly destroy most armored enemies.
$(o)Deals $(l)6.50$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information.
